attributes.action: Extend lock-down until end of June, earliest!
attributes.background: We are asking government to extend the lock-down until the end of June to ensure the safety of our communities.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Since you started your petition the Government has made some changes to the lockdown restrictions. We're not sure exactly whether you'd like these to be reversed, or whether you would like other changes to the lockdown. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
